text: Skazhi: "Kto samyy vernyy v svoyom svidetel'stve?" Skazhi: "Bog; On svidetel' vam obo mne. Mne otkroven etot Koran dlya togo, chtoby im ya uchil vas i tekh, do kogo dostignet on. Ne vy li ispoveduyete, chto vmeste s Bogom yest' yeshcho drugiye bogi?" Skazhi: "YA ne ispoveduyu etogo". Skazhi: "On yest' yedinyy Bog, i ya chist ot vashego mneniya, chto u Nego yest' souchastniki
